DATA.TEXT: An unpleasant smoke fills the air on this planet, making it hard for you two to breathe.
Why is there so much smoke on this planet? And why is everything so dark?
Near your landing position, four monkeys play a game of cards.
Oy, look at the the little chav whinging over there, Mickey.
Yeah boss! What a slag, innit Mack?
Yeah... I bet another two bananas.
H-Hey! You talk in a funny way, what are you playing?
Banana-poker. But it's not a game for kiddies, mate. Tell'em, Mickey.
Yeah, lad, you gotta got hair on ye boat race to play 'ere. Tell'em, Mack.
But I'm a space octopus, we don't have hair!
Yer taking the piss, mate? My sis Mika married a space squiddie that 'ad double the 'air than 'er, innit Mickey?
That's right, boss, ya skin and blister 'ad a proper beard! Mack grifted 'er up and down, innit Mack?
I won... Woofer-Boy takes Mickey's place.
